headline: Bank of America (BAC) Anticipates Continued Growth in Markets Revenue for 13th Consecutive Quarter
summary: Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) is one of the best Goldman Sachs bank stocks. BAC expects its trading revenue to grow by a mid-single digit percentage this quarter, its 13th consecutive increase, according to CEO Brian Moynihan. In contrast, investment banking fees are forecasted to fall to nearly $1.2 billion from $1.6 billion a year […]
